hero.core_tension: Choose short-flight local media and in-store events to win early-window buyer share, or default to blanket discounts that erode margin.
hero.setting: Backstage at a store-as-studio: three-quarter low angle, operator and store manager framed around a small table. Materials: matte program briefs, clipped calendar, acoustic foam backdrop. Composition cue: tight foreground on hands marking dates.
hero.persona: Head of Retail with Partnerships lead
hero.action: Assigning Nov 28–Dec 12 short flights to local stations, mapping unique QR promos and landing pages to each station.
hero.urgency_symbol: A half-turned calendar page revealing the Nov 28–Dec 12 window to signal limited-time flight pressure.
props: stack of local station contact sheets referencing 'Local media inventory is opening fast'
printed QR promo cards for station-level attribution
hero.lighting: Polished editorial light with confident highlights and deep negative space to emphasize decision focus.
hero.alt: Head of Retail assigning Nov2812 radio sponsorships and QR tests

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings (measurement spine) with inner ring as baseline, middle ring as test lifts, outer ring as goal band. Two quant anchors printed on rings show footfall uplift percentages and early-window share targets.
elements: station tokens placed on ring coordinates labeled by CPM and unique promo code
geo lattice overlay showing matched control vs test tiles
QR tokens pinned to station nodes to show attribution links
signal_map.motion: Radial progression from media exposure to store visit to redemption; gradients indicate incremental lift versus baseline across the rings.
signal_map.palette: Warm neutrals and steel-gray materials; tactile paper textures for tokens and a brushed-metal compass at center as measurement anchor.
signal_map.alt: CMO mapping measurement spine with footfall lift and early-window share by station

case_studies.scene: Over-the-shoulder view into a small radio studio briefing: store ops, partnerships lead and producer arranging a live read and unique promo codes.
case_studies.moment: Hands exchanging printed QR cards while the producer ticks a Nov 2812 slot—symbolizing the short-flight attribution test from 'Local media inventory is opening fast'.
case_studies.persona: Head of Partnerships and Local Station Producer
props: stacked QR promo cards with station-specific codes
script pages for in-store event live read
case_studies.lighting: Warm, intimate studio lighting with a highlight on the exchanged codes.
case_studies.alt: Head of Partnerships handing unique QR promos to test radio sponsorship redemptions

case_studies.scene: Top-down war-room table shot: media planner and analyst placing laminated geo tiles and frequency-cap tokens for a hyper-local CTV test.
case_studies.moment: Planner sets a matched-control tile next to a test tile while annotating expected CPA—visualizing 'Programmatic local CTV scales predictable lifts'.
case_studies.persona: Head of Media with Data Analyst
props: laminated geo tiles labeled test vs control
case_studies.lighting: Cool, directional light that separates map elements and creates clear visual hierarchy.
case_studies.alt: Head of Media placing hyper-local CTV buys to test event CPA and early-window share
